price: Nígbà tí wọ́n bá jù wọ́n sínú rẹ̀, wọn yóò máa gbọ́ kíkùn rẹ̀, tí yó sì máa ru sókè.
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
